A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though I admit there is some disconnect in tone between episodes VII and VIII I was overall delighted with this installment of the WS franchises. I am long time SW fan and I love IV trough VI so I understand that some are upset about how characters from the those movies are sent to the background but I understand that these are SW movies for the next generation of fans. Rey\, Kylo\, Fin and Poe should be the focus of these new films. I like the complexity of Luke's struggle with the idea of destroying the Jedi order. I could use less of the political commentary that seems to be foreced into the film\, but that has been a part of these films for a long time. This movie was lengthy but never felt that way. It as fun\, exhilarating and moving. I look forward to my second viewing.
